message: I propose we split the money 60/40.  It's a good deal for you now, and waiting will only hurt me more.
I'm willing to take a bit more since you lose value each round
Bob, let's be realistic. My position weakens every round.  I'm offering 52/48 which is a smaller gain for me than last round.  Take it before it shrinks even more.

Bob, it's clear you're aiming to maximize your share, but dragging this out hurts both of us. I'm willing to take a smaller cut than my previous offer, 48/52, to settle this now.  Let's be reasonable.
